overview: Student Assassin: Teagan Presley is a college student who is dating a police officer. When a drug bust goes bad and the officer is kidnapped, Teagan is the one student bad enough to save the day! Massacre at Pine Lake: A day at Pine Lake Camp takes a dramatic turn when an escaped serial killer finds a whole new set of targets. Several scenes of wild sex later, head counselor Stephanie finds herself in an epic battle to defeat the killer!
title: Grindhouse XXX: A Double Feature
